Adding a new program¶

  1. DefineParameters - MIP input conversion
  2. Add to getoptions
  3. Supply if-block checking if the program should run
    1. Print to MIPLOGG + STDOUT
    2. For each family memeber call your subroutine with memberID + args.
  4. Add a subroutine that submits your program script.
    1. Estimate runtime
    2. Write SBATCH headers
    3. Determine I/O directories
    4. Call FIDsubmit...

Program prerequisites¶

Determine SBATCH headers

  1. SampleID/FamilyID
  2. Program name
  3. ...
  4. ...
  5. Program handle (CLI)
  6. Cores
  7. Runtime estimate
